title: Italian S&D Gualmini leaves her delegation, eyes Renew switch
summary_full: Her exit could reshuffle the socialist group’s internal dynamics: the Italian delegation, once the largest within S&D, would drop to 20 MEPs and tie with the Spanish
summary_public: Her exit could reshuffle the socialist group’s internal dynamics: the Italian delegation, once the largest within S&D, would drop to 20 MEPs and tie with the Spanish

IT.label: neutral
IT.evidence: Italian S&D Gualmini leaves her delegation
